page.title: 03HOUSING (West Block)
page.content: A part of Birchwood (square 9369) is an RAF estate. 98% of the houses are {privately rented.}Many of the houses are semi-detached or in small terraces with 2 or 3 bedrooms and garages in separate blocks.By contrast {private estates}lay on the fringes of Birchwood;these range from mid-priced bungalows and houses to very expensive luxury houses with prices up to Â£70,000. The houses have 3 to 5 bedrooms with large living space. Houses on Birchwood are still being built and the{site could extend}to include 20,000 people. Skellingthorpe is a{growing village}in which there is a community centre near a closed railway station. Many new houses have been built including several bungalows and have generally 2 to 3 bedrooms.The area is quiet with pleasant,tidy gardens.{Many commuters live here.
